snippet: Tempers flared between the Houston Rockets and Dallas on Tuesday, with the Mavericks' Australian center Andrew Bogut among those involved in the thick of the action....
lead_paragraph: Tempers flared between the Houston Rockets and Dallas on Tuesday, with the Mavericks' Australian center Andrew Bogut among those involved in the thick of the action.

headline.main: Bogut Called for Flagrant Foul on Harden as Tempers Flare
headline.print_headline: Bogut Called for Flagrant Foul on Harden as Tempers Flare
